item.title: Version 3
item.description:
Release Note beta: 3
- Now you can sort the keywords for popularity, difficulty change, ranking position and name. - In the preferences menu now you can decide if enable or not automatic updates. - Now you can sort the suggestions - The Select a Store button now is a label - The validate button in the License view now looks like a button. - The first column Ranking was renamed in Ranking Position - Correct typo in “to many request” - Added placeholder to Keyword fields: “You can add multiple keywords separated by a comma” - Fixed crash with Keyword: tablica wyników - If the user is already logged in, the web view will not be shown. - Added shortcut to automatically open keyword field command + N - Added onboarding screen - Removed Set as Primary
